p: Thirdly, special attention is paid to the disinfection of major departments, such as isolation wards, operating rooms, special elevators, and transfer passages. Reuse of surgical instruments in special containers marked as “COVID-19” is handled by the disinfection supply center, and the medical waste is disposed of in accordance with regulations as required by the National Health Committee. 14 Although there have been no suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 in our hospital, strict disinfection measures are taken to prevent nosocomial infection and cross contamination, given that people can spread SARS-CoV-2 before they have symptoms. 15
